summary: Soledad and her battling mother work as laundresses in Seville. When Sole's lively godfather sends a photograph of her to a musical producer, an agent is sent to seek her and she is offered... See full summary »
cast: Miguel Ligero|Estrellita Castro|Roberto Rey|Concha Catalá|Alberto Romea|Pedro Fernández Cuenca|Fortunato García|Manuel Pérez|José Escandel|Juan Calvo
title: Suspiros de España
